Token.Abstract: An Everlive entry point framework object that bootstraps the local representation of the Everlive cloud based on appllicaiton key either from info.plist file or the key set by user explicitly.
Returns the shared instance of your application.
Sets the application key for your applicaiton.

Parameter.Name: appKey
Parameter.Abstract: The application key for your Everlive application.

Token.Abstract: Registers the device in Everlive cloud to receive push notification.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Registers the device in Everlive cloud to receive push notification

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The additional parameters can be used to send notiticaiton to a device based on filter values.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Removes the device from Everlive cloud.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Handles push notification message sent from Everlive application.

Parameter.Name: notification
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary contains the notification details.
